title: C. Gordon Bell, Father of the PDP-8 and VAX, Has Died.
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: Not just a name from computer history, Bell's work is as fresh as today's headlines about Microsoft's Copilot+ PC Replay feature.
cntitle: PDP-8 和 VAX 之父 C. Gordon Bell 去世。
cndescription: 贝尔的工作不仅仅是计算机历史上的一个名字，它与今天关于 Microsoft 的 Copilot+ PC Replay 功能的头条新闻一样新颖。
